title: Any news on updating Taric?
body:
Getting depressing seeing so many champs get visual updates / skin updates, meanwhile Taric is still a polygon from the N64 era, with no viability as a competitive support whatsoever.

moment of silence for Taric {{champion:44}}

replies.body:
I've never really liked playing Taric as a support anyway.

Play him top lane like a man, play him jungle, play him anywhere but support!
Tank Carry Taric will fight anyone and win!

I think jungle sadly would be his best option atm

He has semi-decent clear, but really needs blue buff.


Top lane he works out really well, I've only struggled against Rumble so far, but even then I still get first blood.

He is getting a re-work. Both his kit and visuals. He may come sometime after Poppy but as for now there is nothing official to discuss. He like Poppy however needs a full rework. Unlike Tristana who only needed a partial rework. So you will just have to hold out for a while.
